languages.text: "Нет, Инцендия, не приплетай Императора к своим ошибкам. Власть власти рознь — ты довела людей, и тебе нести ответственность за происходящую бойню".

"No, Incendia, do not invoke the Emperor's name as justification for your mistakes. There are different kinds of authority — you are the one who drove these people to the brink, so you are responsible for the carnage that followed."
languages.original_text: "Нет, Инцендия, не приплетай Императора к своим ошибкам. Власть власти рознь — ты довела людей, и тебе нести ответственность за происходящую бойню".

"No, Incendia, do not invoke the Emperor's name as justification for your mistakes. There are different kinds of authority — you are the one who drove these people to the brink, so you are responsible for the carnage that followed."

languages.text: “不，因森蒂娅，不要以帝皇的名义为你的错误辩护。这世上有各种各样的统治者，而你是把臣民逼上绝路的那种统治者，因此，你必须为这场大屠杀负责。”
languages.original_text: "No, Incendia, do not invoke the Emperor's name as justification for your mistakes. There are different kinds of authority — you are the one who drove these people to the brink, so you are responsible for the carnage that followed."

traits.locale_text: “不，因森蒂娅，不要以帝皇的名义为你的错误辩护。这世上有各种各样的统治者，而你是把臣民逼上绝路的那种统治者，因此，你必须为这场大屠杀负责。”

languages.text: «No, Incendia. No recurra al nombre del Emperador como justificación de sus errores. Hay diferentes tipos de autoridad. Usted llevó a esta gente al borde del colapso, y, por lo tanto, es responsable de la carnicería subsiguiente».
languages.original_text: "No, Incendia, do not invoke the Emperor's name as justification for your mistakes. There are different kinds of authority — you are the one who drove these people to the brink, so you are responsible for the carnage that followed."

traits.locale_text: «No, Incendia. No recurra al nombre del Emperador como justificación de sus errores. Hay diferentes tipos de autoridad. Usted llevó a esta gente al borde del colapso, y, por lo tanto, es responsable de la carnicería subsiguiente».

languages.text: « Non, Incendia, n'invoquez pas le nom de l'Empereur pour justifier vos erreurs. Il existe différents types d'autorités : c'est vous qui avez poussé ces gens dans leurs derniers retranchements, et vous êtes responsable du carnage qui s'est ensuivi. »
languages.original_text: "No, Incendia, do not invoke the Emperor's name as justification for your mistakes. There are different kinds of authority — you are the one who drove these people to the brink, so you are responsible for the carnage that followed."

traits.locale_text: « Non, Incendia, n'invoquez pas le nom de l'Empereur pour justifier vos erreurs. Il existe différents types d'autorités : c'est vous qui avez poussé ces gens dans leurs derniers retranchements, et vous êtes responsable du carnage qui s'est ensuivi. »

languages.text: 「違う、インセンディア。自分の過ちを正当化するのに皇帝の名を持ち出すな。権威には様々な種類がある。お前こそがこの人々を追い詰めた張本人であり、その結果として起きた惨劇の責任を負うべき者だ」
languages.original_text: "No, Incendia, do not invoke the Emperor's name as justification for your mistakes. There are different kinds of authority — you are the one who drove these people to the brink, so you are responsible for the carnage that followed."

traits.locale_text: 「違う、インセンディア。自分の過ちを正当化するのに皇帝の名を持ち出すな。権威には様々な種類がある。お前こそがこの人々を追い詰めた張本人であり、その結果として起きた惨劇の責任を負うべき者だ」

languages.text: "Hayır İncendia, hataların için İmparator'un adını gerekçe olarak kullanma. Farklı türde sorumluluklar vardır. Bu insanları uçuruma sen sürükledin, bu yüzden ardından gelen katliamdan sen sorumlusun."
languages.original_text: "No, Incendia, do not invoke the Emperor's name as justification for your mistakes. There are different kinds of authority — you are the one who drove these people to the brink, so you are responsible for the carnage that followed."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır, İncendia, hataların için İmparator'un adını gerekçe olarak kullanma. Farklı türde sorumluluklar vardır. Bu insanları uçuruma sen sürükledin, bu yüzden ardından gelen katliamdan sen sorumlusun."

languages.text: "Nein, Incendia, benutzt nicht den Namen des Imperators als Rechtfertigung für Eure Fehler. Es gibt verschiedene Arten von Autorität – Ihr habt diese Leute bis an den Rand gedrängt, also seid Ihr auch verantwortlich für das resultierende Blutbad."
languages.original_text: "No, Incendia, do not invoke the Emperor's name as justification for your mistakes. There are different kinds of authority — you are the one who drove these people to the brink, so you are responsible for the carnage that followed."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, Incendia, benutzt nicht den Namen des Imperators als Rechtfertigung für Eure Fehler. Es gibt verschiedene Arten von Autorität – Ihr habt diese Leute bis an den Rand gedrängt, also seid Ihr auch verantwortlich für das resultierende Blutbad."
